name: It's Cave Time!
description:
Have you ever wanted to be lost in an underground cave system? Of course not! That would be horrible. Which is why you can now do it in video game form! Enjoy the very first  Make Up Your Mind Already Adventure!

  • Make bad decisions in a cave!
  • Regret the consequences almost immediately!
  • Meet strange and fascinating monsters characters!
  • Fill your pockets with random junk that you will probably never use!
  • Waste time on your phone instead of exploring the cave!
  • Click "Try Again" to go back to the previous choice any time you get the Game Over knocked out of you!
  • Optional Diegetic New Game+ Mode!
  • AND ALMOST MUCH MUCH MORE!!
